pruneGlobalEvents

public void pruneGlobalEvents()
Description copied from interface: FSAEventsModel
Removes any events from the global alphabet that do not appear in any of the local alphabets. WARNING: use with extreme caution; should have a flag set in any constructor to prevent frivolous use of this method.

Specified by:
pruneGlobalEvents in interface FSAEventsModel
